oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fisk Jubilee Singers' Male Quartet performs at Peabody College, 1948 July 26
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the Male Quartet of the Fisk Jubilee Singers performing at Peabody College, July 26, 1948. Directed by 20-year veteran Mrs. James A. Myers, the group had recently completed their first tour of Latin America and the Caribbean, appearing in Mexico City, Cuba, Venezuela and Haiti. Pictured from left to right are Starling Hatchett, tenor; Norton Evans, tenor; Brooks Alexander, baritone; and Samuel Floyd, bass. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hatchett, Starling; Evans, Norton; Alexander, Brooks; Floyd, Samuel
